messages.message:
Something to think about: ”
*Matthew Carnali* [3:19 AM]
We need a nice way to write validations with a UI/If then logic builder type app.


*nakul*:waxing_gibbous_moon: [3:20 AM]
^ would have been useful with moody’s too

”

Validations against fields being pulled from Refiner or any data extractions
this would be part of Refiner V5 — as in, enhanced features for validations in the UI @lydia?

If you have ideas of specific things to add to the validations panel (at the bottom of the screenshot), feel free to file a feature request under the MINT board in Jira. From my understanding, it’s fairly simple to add things, and each of these fields basically modifies a hidden validation field in the refiner program

https://instabase.atlassian.net/secure/CreateIssue.jspa?pid=10002&issuetype=10103
